longBusinessSummary: HB Stockholdings Limited, a non-banking financial and non-deposit taking company, engages in the activities of investment in securities in India. It is involved in the purchase and sale of securities. The company was formerly known as HB Portfolio Leasing Limited and changed its name to HB Stockholdings Limited in February 1997. HB Stockholdings Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Gurugram, India.
